channel.title: Studio: Restaurant Menu Continued :: C# Web Development
channel.description: We began designing and implementing our Menu and MenuItem classes in the last studio . Letâ€™s continue working on these classes by adding some methods. Design To review, here are the details you have from the restaurant owner: The menu consists of several menu items. Each menu item has a price, description, and category (appetizer, main course, or dessert). It should be possible to display whether or not a menu item is new.
